speaker: char
text: I look so cool! This must be it, exactly what the guy wants. I just need to think about acting cool, so he’s impressed.

speaker: char
text: We’re going go-kart racing. I hope I can keep up. I would normally maybe choose something just a bit low key, where I can really talk to the person.

speaker: char
text: But he wants excitement so that’s what I have to do!
